compositeCheatsheet.name: Create a report with a chart

taskGroup.name: Create a report with a dataset and a chart
taskGroup.intro: In this cheatsheet is explained how to create a report from scratch, add a dataset, a chart and execute it.
taskGroup.onCompletion: At the end of this steps we have a report with a complex layout and a main dataset used to provide many records. Then another dataset is used to fill a chart. Then all this can be compiled and exported. Doing this we have seen many complex concepts like the subdataset and the charts.

task.name: Create the report
task.intro: In this first step the base report will be created, with a nice layout and some data in it.
task.onCompletion: Now you have a report with a main dataset and some fields in it, that can be compiled and executed.

task.name: Create a dataset
task.intro: Every report has a main dataset, defined when the report is created. But sometime we need more than one dataset, because we need data from different datasources or becasue we need to discover the same datasource with different query. In this cheetsheet we will see how to create a dataset other than the main one.
task.onCompletion: At this point you have a report with two datasource, one it is the main dataset. The other is a secondary dataset that can extract the data from the same datasource of the first, but aggregated in a different way.

task.name: Create the Chart
task.intro: In this steps we will add a chart in the summary band of the report created in the step 1, and this chart will take the data from the dataset created in the step 2.
task.onCompletion: At this point you have a chart in your report that read the data from a secondary dataset.

task.name: Run the report
task.intro: After the report is fully defined it can be compiled, viewed and exported.
task.onCompletion: Finally you have a report with two dataset, the main one and a secondary one, some fields and achart. The first is used to fill the fields, the second to fill the chart. And this report could be compiled and executed.
